name: NSBox
desc: A stylized rectangular box with an optional title.

items.name: var borderRect: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle in which the receiver’s border is drawn.

items.name: var isTransparent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is transparent.

items.name: var titleFont: NSFont
items.desc: The font object used to draw the receiver’s title.

items.name: var titlePosition: NSBox.TitlePosition
items.desc: A constant representing the title position.

items.name: var titleCell: Any
items.desc: The cell used to display the receiver’s title.

items.name: var titleRect: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle in which the receiver’s title is drawn.

items.name: var borderColor: NSColor
items.desc: The color of the receiver’s border when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.

items.name: var borderWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: The width of the receiver’s border when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of the receiver’s corners when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.

items.name: var fillColor: NSColor
items.desc: The color of the receiver’s background when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.

items.name: var contentViewMargins: NSSize
items.desc: The distances between the border and the content view.

items.name: func setFrameFromContentFrame(NSRect)
items.desc: Places the receiver so its content view lies on the specified frame.

items.name: func sizeToFit()
items.desc: Resizes and moves the receiver’s content view so it just encloses its subviews.

items.name: enum NSBox.TitlePosition
items.desc: Specify the location of a box’s title with respect to its border.

items.name: enum NSBox.BoxType
items.desc: These constants and data type identifies box types, which, in conjunction with a box's border type, define the appearance of the box.
